In a time of deep division, I am not interested in fanning the flames or fear-mongering. I desire to work with anyone interested in serving the constituents of Oklahoma and bringing our country forward in unity.

Traveling the state, meeting countless people, I‚Äôve consistently found myself asking, ‚Äúwhen did we as a country decide that fleeting and inconsequential political victories mattered more than the lives of people who are just trying to get by and raise their families?‚Äù

We are the only campaign that has visited all 77 counties in Oklahoma and that is why we have gained the reputation as ‚Äúthe campaign that shows up‚Äù.

When we showed up in Texas County, we were told that even on the rare occasion when an elected official does show up, they FLY in and out. One resident said, "our officials have no clue the issues the area is facing, and they don't try to engage with us."

It's important to me to visit every corner of Oklahoma during this campaign, and that's why I'm proud to say we've already visited all 77 counties. 

It was a pleasure to spend some time chatting with folks at a recent Hooker Chamber of Commerce meeting in Texas County! https://t.co/S1Ivw1zE42
